entry.content:
Example of project - Indigo Minimalist Jekyll Template - Demo. This is a simple and minimalist template for Jekyll for those who likes to eat noodles.

What has inside?

  • Gulp
  • BrowserSync
  • Stylus
  • SVG
  • Travis
  • No JS
  • 98/100

Check it out here. If you need some help, just tell me.
entry.summary: Example of project - Indigo Minimalist Jekyll Template - Demo. This is a simple and minimalist template for Jekyll for those who likes to eat noodles.

entry.title: ü§ñ HQ Helping Hand
entry.content: This was hacked together over the span of about a day or two, so the search and answer algorithm could use some work. This mainly serves as a proof of concept for the idea that search can be automated successfully within the ten second time frame.
